participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves adventures and fairy tales.
participant_1.background: i'm in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: outdoorsy and friendly, enjoys sports and spending time with animals.
participant_2.background: i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i enjoy coloring books.
